Name: Adrenaline Junkie
Description: Moves faster when highly panicked.\n
Effect: Adds a flat bonus of 0.20 or 0.25 for the character's base speed at Strong or Extreme Panic, which increases walking, running, and sprinting speed. There's currently a bug that makes the character's combat walk speed much less affected by Heavy Load or Exertion.

Name: Athletic
Description: Can run faster and longer without tiring.\n
Effect: +4 Fitness. 40% running/sprinting endurance loss from the trait itself.

Name: Brave
Description: Less prone to becoming panicked.\n
Effect: 30% panic except for night terrors and phobias.

Name: Cat's Eyes
Description: Better vision at night.\n
Effect: +20% better vision at night. Affects search mode

Name: Dextrous
Description: Transfers inventory items quickly.\n
Effect: 50% inventory transferring time.

Name: Eagle Eyed
Description: Has a faster visibility fade and a higher visibility arc.\n
Effect: Character has a wider field of view. Affects search mode

Name: Fast Healer
Description: Recovers faster from injury and illness.\n
Effect: Does not apply to exercise fatigue. Recently inflicted injuries have less severity.Including Scratches, Lacerations, Lodged Bullets, Deep wounds (with/without glass), Bites and Fractures. (Check Health for more details.)

Name: Fast Learner
Description: Increases XP gains.\n
Effect: 130% XP for all skills except Strength and Fitness.

Name: Fast Reader
Description: Takes less time to read books.\n
Effect: 130% reading speed.

Name: Fit
Description: In good physical shape.\n
Effect: +2 Fitness.

Name: Graceful
Description: Makes less noise when moving.\n
Effect: 60% footsteps sound radius. 90% chance to trip while run/sprint vaulting a low fence or lunging zombies.

Name: Inconspicuous
Description: Less likely to be spotted by zombies.\n
Effect: 50% chance of zombies spotting you.

Name: Iron Gut
Description: Less chance to have food illness.\n
Effect: 50% chance of food illness. Food illness lasts shorter. Check Health for more details.

Name: Keen Hearing
Description: Larger perception radius.\n
Effect: 200% perception radius. Zombies that approach from behind will be visible much earlier.

Name: Light Eater
Description: Needs to eat less regularly.\n
Effect: 75% hunger.

Name: Low Thirst
Description: Needs to drink water less regularly.\n
Effect: 50% thirst.

Name: Lucky
Description: Sometimes things just go your way.\n
Effect: +10% chance of finding rare loot. -5% chance of failing item repairs. Affects search mode

Name: Organized
Description: Increased container inventory capacity.\n
Effect: 130% capacity for all containers, including boxes, cupboards and cars

Name: Outdoorsman
Description: Not affected by harsh weather conditions.\n
Effect: 10% chance of catching a cold. 1% or 1.25% chance of getting scratched/lacerated while Walking or Running through trees. Start a fire on campfires with Notched Plank faster. Affects search mode

Name: Resilient
Description: Less prone to disease. Slower rate of zombification.\n
Effect: 75% zombification progression rate, 45% chance of catching a cold, 80% cold strength and 50% cold progression speed.

Name: Speed Demon
Description: The fast driver.\n
Effect: 200% Gear switching speed, 115% top speed for all vehicles

Name: Stout
Description: Extra knockback from melee weapons and increased carry weight.\n
Effect: +2 Strength

Name: Strong
Description: Extra knockback from melee weapons and increased carry weight.\n
Effect: +4 Strength, 140% melee damage.

Name: Thick Skinned
Description: Less chance of scratches or bites breaking the skin.\n
Effect: Multiplies the chance of not being injured by a zombie attack by 1.3 (base 15% chance, modified by character's weapon skill). Additionally, alters the chance of clothes being damaged by walking through trees to 1 in 13.

Name: Wakeful
Description: Needs less sleep.\n
Effect: -30% less sleep required

Name: Amateur Mechanic
Description: Familiar with the maintenance and repair of all vehicle models on the roads of Kentucky\n
Effect: +3 Mechanics, can repair all vehicle types without having to read any recipe magazines.

Name: Amateur Mechanic
Description: Has a detailed knowledge of common and heavy vehicle models and their repairs.\n
Effect: +1 Mechanics, can repair standard and heavy-duty vehicles.

Name: Angler
Description: Knows the basic of fishing.\n
Effect: +1 Fishing Knows how to make and fix a fishing rod.

Name: Axe Man
Description: Better at chopping trees. Faster axe swing.\n
Effect: Chops trees 25% faster.

Name: Baseball Player
Description: Has practice with a baseball bat and knows how to hit with precision.\n
Effect: +1 Long Blunt

Name: Burglar
Description: Can hotwire vehicles, less chance of breaking the lock of a window.\n
Effect: Can hotwire vehicles and has less chance of breaking the lock of a window when forced open.

Name: Brawler
Description: Used to getting into trouble.\n
Effect: +1 Axe, +1 Long Blunt

Name: Cook
Description: Knows cooking recipes.\n
Effect: +2 Cooking Knows all the cooking recipes without having to read any recipe magazines. Affects search mode.

Name: Cook
Description: Knows how to cook.\n
Effect: Affects search mode and knows all the cooking recipes without having to read any recipe magazines.

Name: Desensitized
Description: War.... War never changes.\n
Effect: 0% panic from all sources except night terrors.

Name: First Aider
Description: Has a CPR and First Aid course certificate.\n
Effect: +1 First Aid

Name: Former Scout
Description: Knows how to pick wild berries and how to treat small injuries.\n
Effect: +1 First Aid, +1 Foraging. Affects search mode.

Name: Gardener
Description: Has basic agriculture knowledge.\n
Effect: +1 Farming  Knows mildew and flies cure. Affects search mode.

Name: Gymnast
Description: Agile and discreet.\n
Effect: +1 Lightfooted, +1 Nimble

Name: Handy
Description: Faster and stronger constructions.\n
Effect: +1 Carpentry, +1 Maintenance  +100HP to all constructions.  Increases building speed (~11%).

Name: Herbalist
Description: Can find medicinal herbs and craft medicines and poultices from them.\n
Effect: Able to find herbal medicines, make poultices from them, and identify poisonous wild food. Affects search mode.

Name: Hiker
Description: Used to surviving in the jungle.\n
Effect: +1 Foraging, +1 Trapping. Affects search mode.

Name: Hunter
Description: Know the basics of hunting.\n
Effect: +1 Aiming, +1 Short Blade, +1 Sneaking, +1 Trapping and affects search mode.

Name: Night Owl
Description: Requires little sleep. Stays extra alert when sleeping\n
Effect: Recovers from tiredness quicker while sleeping, but will remain asleep even when your character reaches 0 tiredness, which requires an alarm to take advantage of the trait.

Name: Nutritionist
Description: Can see the nutritional values of any food.\n
Effect: Allows the player to see the nutritional values of any food, even those that aren't packaged. Affects search mode.

Name: Runner
Description: Runner in the spare times.\n
Effect: +1 Sprinting

Name: Sewer
Description: +1 Tailoring\n
Effect: +1 Tailoring

Name: Agoraphobic
Description: Gets panicked when outdoors\n
Effect: Enters in Panic when outdoors and affects search mode.

Name: All Thumbs
Description: Transfers inventory items slowly\n
Effect: 400% inventory transferring time.

Name: Asthmatic
Description: Faster endurance loss\n
Effect: 140% running/sprinting endurance loss. 130% increase in swing endurance lost.

Name: Claustrophobic
Description: Gets panicked when indoors\n
Effect: Enters in Panic when indoors.

Name: Clumsy
Description: Makes more noise when moving\n
Effect: 120% footsteps sound radius, 110% chance to trip while run/sprint vaulting a low fence or lunging zombies.

Name: Conspicuous
Description: More likely to be spotted by zombies.\n
Effect: 200% chance of getting spotted by zombies.

Name: Cowardly
Description: Especially prone to becoming panicked\n
Effect: 200% panic except for night terrors and phobias.

Name: Deaf
Description: Smaller perception radius and hearing range\n
Effect: Can't hear sound. Radio chatter will not appear above the radio, however, they can see/read a TV due to closed captions.

Name: Disorganized
Description: Decreased container inventory capacity\n
Effect: 70% capacity for all containers, including boxes and cupboards.

Name: Emaciated
Description: Low strength, low endurance and prone to injury\n
Effect: Is only present at weight 50 and less and will begin taking damage at weight 35. 40% melee damage. 75% chance to fail to climb a tall fence. 30% endurance regeneration. 20 more fall damage.

Name: Feeble
Description: Less knockback from melee weapons. Decreased carrying weight.\n
Effect: -2 Strength

Name: Hard of Hearing
Description: Smaller perception radius. Smaller hearing range.\n
Effect: Besides the decreased perception radius, the range of sound will be decreased and the sound effects will be muffled.

Name: Hearty Appetite
Description: Needs to eat more regularly\n
Effect: 150% hunger.

Name: Hemophobic
Description: Panic when performing first aid on self, cannot perform first aid on others, gets stressed when bloody\n

Name: High Thirst
Description: Needs more water to survive\n
Effect: 200% thirst

Name: Illiterate
Description: Cannot read books\n
Effect: Unable to get a mood boost by reading leisure books, learning new recipes by reading recipe magazines or getting an XP multiplier by reading skill books.

Name: Out of Shape
Description: Low endurance, low endurance regeneration.\n
Effect: -2 Fitness

Name: Obese
Description: Reduced running speed, very low endurance and prone to injury.\n
Effect: -2 Fitness. Max Fitness of 6. The trait itself reduce run speed and endurance. Starting weight is 105 and is only present at weight 100 and above. 120% chance to trip while run/sprint vaulting a low fence. 90% chance to trip from lunging zombies. 75% chance to climb a tall fence. 40% endurance regeneration. 20 more fall damage.

Name: Overweight
Description: Reduced running speed, low endurance and prone to injury.\n
Effect: Max Fitness of 9. Starting weight is 90 and is only present between weights 85 and 100. 1% slower running speed, 200% endurance loss. 110% chance to trip while run/sprint vaulting a low fence. 95% chance to trip by lunging zombies. 85% chance to climb a tall fence. 70% endurance regeneration.

Name: Pacifist
Description: Less effective with weapons\n
Effect: 75% XP of Melee and Aiming skill.

Name: Prone to Illness
Description: More prone to disease. Faster rate of zombification.\n
Effect: 125% progression rate of zombification. 170% chance of catching a cold, 120% cold strength and 150% cold progression speed.

Name: Restless Sleeper
Description: Slow loss of tiredness while sleeping\n
Effect: Sleep for fewer hours each time, and slower loss of tiredness when sleeping.

Name: Short Sighted
Description: Small view distance. Slower visibility fade.\n
Effect: -2 foraging radius in search mode.

Name: Sleepyhead
Description: Needs more sleep\n
Effect: 70% tiredness rate.

Name: Smoker
Description: Stress and unhappiness decrease after smoking tobacco. Unhappiness rises when tobacco is not smoked.\n
Effect: Stress will constantly slowly rise. Smoking Cigarettes will lower the stress level.

Name: Slow Healer
Description: Recovers slowly from injuries and illness\n
Effect: Does not apply to exercise fatigue. Recently inflicted injuries have more severity.Including Scratches, Lacerations, Lodged Bullets, Deep wounds (with/without glass), Bites and Fractures. (Check Health for more details.)

Name: Slow Learner
Description: Decreased XP gains\n
Effect: 70% XP in all skills except Strength and Fitness.

Name: Slow Reader
Description: Takes longer to read books\n
Effect: 70% reading speed.

Name: Sunday driver
Description: The very slow driver\n
Effect: Accelerates vehicles 40% slower. Has a max speed of 30 km/h.

Name: Thin-skinned
Description: Increased chance of scratches, lacerations, or bites breaking the skin.\n
Effect: Multiplies the chance of not being injured by a zombie attack by 0.7 (base 15% chance, modified by character's weapon skill). Additionally, alters the chance of clothes being damaged by walking through trees to 1 in 3.

Name: Underweight
Description: Low strength, low endurance and prone to injury.\n
Effect: -1 Fitness. Starting weight is 70 and is only present between weights 65 and 75. 80%x melee damage. +10% chance to trip by while run/sprint vaulting a low fence or from lunging zombies. 85%x chance to fail a tall fence climb.

Name: Unfit
Description: Very low endurance, very low endurance regeneration. \n
Effect: -4 Fitness

Name: Unlucky
Description: What could go wrong for you, often does.\n
Effect: -10% chance of finding rare loot. +5% chance of failing item repairs. Affects search mode.

Name: Very Underweight
Description: Very low strength, very low endurance and prone to injury.\n
Effect: -2 Fitness. Starting weight is 60 and is only present between weights 50 and 65. 60%x melee damage. +20% chance to trip by while run/sprint vaulting a low fence or from lunging zombies. 75%x chance to fail a tall fence climb. 10 more fall damage.

Name: Weak
Description: Less knockback from melee weapons. Decreased carrying weight.\n
Effect: -5 Strength, 60% melee damage.

Name: Weak Stomach
Description: Higher chance to have food illness.\n
Effect: 200% chance of food illness. Food illness lasts shorter. Check Health for more details.
